tool_description: Access and retrieve property data in the UK by latitude, longitude, or postcode.
name: UK Property
title: UK Property

api_list.name: NOMIS Authority Search
api_list.description: Retrieves the URL for a supplied postcode NOMIS local authority.

api_list.name: Planning Application Authority Search
api_list.description: Retrieves the URL for a supplied postcode local authority.

api_list.name: Domestic EPC Certificate
api_list.description: Retrieves the URL for a specified property's EPC rating.

api_list.name: Domestic EPC Search
api_list.description:
Retrieves a maximum of the 10 closest properties to the supplied latitude and longitude.

Compliant properties are considered to be EPC 'C' and above. This is inline with the UK Government's proposal to force let properties to have a minimum EPC rating of 'C'.
